name: github_star_repo
description: Star a GitHub repository. You must be logged into GitHub.

steps.code: const starBtn = document.querySelector('button[data-ga-click*="star"], form.unstarred button, .js-toggler-container:not(.on) button.btn-sm'); if (!starBtn) { const alreadyStarred = document.querySelector('form.starred button, .js-toggler-container.on button'); if (alreadyStarred) return { success: true, message: 'Already starred', repo: window.location.pathname.substring(1) }; return { success: false, message: 'Star button not found - make sure you are logged in' }; } starBtn.click(); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 1000)); return { success: true, message: 'Repository starred', repo: window.location.pathname.substring(1) }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Click star button
